name: Emerald OG
description: Emerald OG, a strain developed by the California Breeders Association, is a vigorous cross that combines Fire OG with Emerald Diesel. The resulting hybrid was then backcrossed with the pollen from a Fire OG male to forge this indica-dominant hybrid. Emerald OG has a blend of mild floral and melon flavors that mix with pungent citrus notes and produce deep relaxing effects that are a great answer for migraines and sleepless nights.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Uplifted, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Headaches, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Dry Eyes, Headache
